entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
